original: @69a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @69a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ao n+yan t'a re kra ma /
analyzed: ao n+yan t'a re kra ma /
translated: Onyantare krama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: au rgyan gyi sgrol ma'i rim pa /
analyzed: au rgyan gyi sgrol ma'i rim pa /
translated: The Stages of Uḍḍiyāna Tārā

original: sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Tārā.

original: lha rnams kun nam bcu gsum mam //
analyzed: lha rnams kun nam bcu gsum mam //
translated: Meditate on all the deities, thirteen,

original: dgu'am lnga yi bdag nyid can //
analyzed: dgu'am lnga yi bdag nyid can //
translated: nine, or five in nature,

original: gtso bo 'ba' zhig bsgoms nas ni //
analyzed: gtso bo 'ba' zhig bsgoms nas ni //
translated: or just the principal deity alone,

original: sngags ni 'di rnams bzlas pa bya ;🔽/ aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re h'um phad /
analyzed: sngags ni 'di rnams bzlas pa bya ; / aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re h'um phad /
translated: and recite these mantras.🔽Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom su ra te shva ri h'um phat /🔽aom su ra ta sonta re h'um phad /🔽aom su ra ta tsandra h'um phad /
analyzed: aom su ra te shva ri h'um phat / aom su ra ta sonta re h'um phad / aom su ra ta tsandra h'um phad /
translated: Oṃ surateśvari hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ suratasontari hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ suratacandari hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom su ra ta ka mi ni h'um phad /🔽aom su ra ta au gra h'um phad /
analyzed: aom su ra ta ka mi ni h'um phad / aom su ra ta au gra h'um phad /
translated: Oṃ suratakaminī hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ suranugrahī hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom su ra ta autta ma h'um phat /🔽aom shi khi h'um phad /
analyzed: aom su ra ta autta ma h'um phat / aom shi khi h'um phad /
translated: Oṃ suranuttamā hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ śikhī hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom bhi ma h'um phad /
analyzed: aom bhi ma h'um phad /
translated: Oṃ bhimī hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom shi khandi h'um phad /🔽aom k'a r'a li h'um phad /
analyzed: aom shi khandi h'um phad / aom k'a r'a li h'um phad /
translated: Oṃ śikhāndī hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ kālī hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom dz'a ti li h'um phad /
analyzed: aom dz'a ti li h'um phad /
translated: Oṃ jātilī hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom ra au tri h'um phad /🔽aom dza ti h'um phad /
analyzed: aom ra au tri h'um phad / aom dza ti h'um phad /
translated: Oṃ rātrī hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ jāti hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom ma auntri h'um phad /
analyzed: aom ma auntri h'um phad /
translated: Oṃ mātrī hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom bhi ka ta h'um phat /
analyzed: aom bhi ka ta h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ bhīkaṭa hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom aut sha ta h'um phat /🔽aom ke re ti h'um phat /
analyzed: aom aut sha ta h'um phat / aom ke re ti h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ utsaṭa hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ keretī hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom narte ki h'um phat /🔽aom dza: kam pu tsi h'um phat /
analyzed: aom narte ki h'um phat / aom dza: kam pu tsi h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ naratekī hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ jaḥ kaṃpuci hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom h'um pukka s'i h'um phat /🔽aom mam do mbi ni h'um phat /
analyzed: aom h'um pukka s'i h'um phat / aom mam do mbi ni h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ hūṃ pukkasī hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ maṃ dombinī hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ho ma tam gi h'um phat /
analyzed: aom ho ma tam gi h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ ho matangī hūṃ phaṭ.

original: gsang sngags 'di rnams yang dag brjod //
analyzed: gsang sngags 'di rnams yang dag brjod //
translated: These mantras are to be recited.

original: snying gi dbus su gtso mo ste //
analyzed: snying gi dbus su gtso mo ste //
translated: In the center of the heart is the principal goddess.

original: mtshog kha la sogs gnas rnams su //
analyzed: mtshog kha la sogs gnas rnams su //
translated: In the places such as the forehead and so forth,

original: lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi bsgoms //
analyzed: lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi bsgoms //
translated: meditate on the twenty-four goddesses.

original: slob ma rnams la nges par ni //
analyzed: slob ma rnams la nges par ni //
translated: For the disciples,

original: lha rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob //
analyzed: lha rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob //
translated: all the deities will certainly bestow blessings.

original: au rgyan gyi sgrol ma'i rim pa gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba rdzogs so /
analyzed: au rgyan gyi sgrol ma'i rim pa gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba rdzogs so /
translated: The stage of Uḍḍiyāna Tārā, more secret than secret, is complete.

original: // / pandi ta sam gha shr'i dang / lo ts'a ba 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjes bsgyur ba'o /🔽// / aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re h'um phat /
analyzed: // / pandi ta sam gha shr'i dang / lo ts'a ba 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjes bsgyur ba'o / // / aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re h'um phat /

original: aom su ra te shva ri h'um phat la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: aom su ra te shva ri h'um phat la sogs pa'o //
translated: Oṃ surateśvari hūṃ phaṭ and so forth.

original: aom aa sha putstsha h'um phat aom h'um la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: aom aa sha putstsha h'um phat aom h'um la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: pandi ta pa ra he ta / grub thob wi ni ta bha dra /
